## Classes

### <a name="modern_shell_tools"></a>`modern_shell_tools`

Installs a set of modern commandline tools

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include modern_shell_tools
```

### <a name="modern_shell_toolsinstall"></a>`modern_shell_tools::install`

A private class for installing prerequirements

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include modern_shell_tools::install
```

### <a name="modern_shell_toolsinstallbashtop"></a>`modern_shell_tools::install::bashtop`

A modern replacement for top/htop

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include modern_shell_tools::install::bashtop
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `modern_shell_tools::install::bashtop` class:

* [`version`](#version)
* [`install_path`](#install_path)
* [`bin_path`](#bin_path)

##### <a name="version"></a>`version`

Data type: `String[1]`



Default value: `'0.9.25'`

##### <a name="install_path"></a>`install_path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `"/opt/mst/bashtop-${version}"`

##### <a name="bin_path"></a>`bin_path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `'/usr/local/sbin'`

### <a name="modern_shell_toolsinstallbroot"></a>`modern_shell_tools::install::broot`

A tree explorer and a customizable launcher

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include modern_shell_tools::install::broot
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `modern_shell_tools::install::broot` class:

* [`arch`](#arch)
* [`build`](#build)
* [`version`](#version)
* [`archive_name`](#archive_name)
* [`install_path`](#install_path)
* [`bin_path`](#bin_path)
* [`create_path`](#create_path)

##### <a name="arch"></a>`arch`

Data type: `String[1]`



Default value: `$facts['os']['architecture']`

##### <a name="build"></a>`build`

Data type: `String[1]`



Default value: `'linux'`

##### <a name="version"></a>`version`

Data type: `String[1]`



Default value: `'1.13.1'`

##### <a name="archive_name"></a>`archive_name`

Data type: `String[1]`



Default value: `"broot_${version}.zip"`

##### <a name="install_path"></a>`install_path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `"/opt/mst/broot-${version}"`

##### <a name="bin_path"></a>`bin_path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `'/usr/local/sbin'`

##### <a name="create_path"></a>`create_path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `"${install_path}/${arch}-unknown-${build}-gnu"`

### <a name="modern_shell_toolsinstalldyff"></a>`modern_shell_tools::install::dyff`

δyƒƒ /ˈdʏf/ - a diff tool for YAML files, and sometimes JSON

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include modern_shell_tools::install::dyff
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `modern_shell_tools::install::dyff` class:

* [`arch`](#arch)
* [`build`](#build)
* [`version`](#version)
* [`archive_name`](#archive_name)
* [`install_path`](#install_path)
* [`bin_path`](#bin_path)
* [`create_path`](#create_path)

##### <a name="arch"></a>`arch`

Data type: `String[1]`



Default value: `'amd64'`

##### <a name="build"></a>`build`

Data type: `String[1]`



Default value: `'linux'`

##### <a name="version"></a>`version`

Data type: `String[1]`



Default value: `'1.5.4'`

##### <a name="archive_name"></a>`archive_name`

Data type: `String[1]`



Default value: `"dyff_${version}_${build}_${arch}.tar.gz"`

##### <a name="install_path"></a>`install_path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `"/opt/mst/dyff-${version}"`

##### <a name="bin_path"></a>`bin_path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `'/usr/local/sbin'`

##### <a name="create_path"></a>`create_path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `"${install_path}/dyff"`
